page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A MUM
page.content:
{************************************** {************************************** {______________________________________ {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A MUM IN 1985. GETS UP AND MAKES HER HUSBAND'S BREAKFAST.TIDY HOUSE AND GET BOYS' READY FOR SCHOOL.THEN TO HER MOTHER'S FOR ONE AND A HALF HOURS OF HOUSE WORK OR GARDENING AT MOTHER'S HOUSE.BACK UP TO SCHOOL FOR SON AT 11am.NEXT,HOME FOR DINNER,FEED FAMILY,FOLLOWED BY ONE HOUR OF CAKE MAKING,ONE HOUR OF PLAYING GAMES WITH GRANDAD.HOOVER UP AND FETCH OTHER SONS' FROM SCHOOL.GET TEA READY FOR HUSBAND. AT NIGHT DO SOME KNITTING AND LISTEN TO THE TELEVISION OR PLAY GAMES ON THE COMPUTER,THEN GET READY FOR BED.
{_____________________________________ {************************************* {*************************************
